results.title: Metformin increases sensitivity of osteosarcoma stem cells to cisplatin by inhibiting expression of PKM2.
results.text_hl: Therefore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ impaired the resistance of @<m>DISEASE_Holt_Oram_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535326 @@@HOS@@@ CSCs to @CHEMICAL_Cisplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002945 @@@cisplatin@@@ and promoted @CHEMICAL_Cisplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002945 @@@cisplatin@@@-induced apoptosis.
